attributes.action: Focus on a simple plan to achieve peace to end the war in Ukraine
attributes.additional_details:
The war in Ukraine is the latest in a long line of foreign policy disasters, over a million people have died, Ukraine has lost over 20% of it’s territory, it is imperative that this war must stop now.
The previous government encouraged Ukraine to continue fighting, this was a mistake and the current government must not follow the mistaken path of the previous.
Decisions must be based on evidence, the publicly available evidence of maps and video footage clearly shows the situation is futile.
attributes.background:
We the undersigned want the government to lead international efforts to to develop a simple plan to achieve peace in Ukraine.
This plan should include a full and unconditional ceasefire.
The word ‘just’ as an adverb can mean ‘simply’ and we simply want peace in Ukraine.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702643
